about_the_game:
The first mmorpg-f that will give players a whole new, unique experience and absolute freedom in the world of Yggdrasil.
Yggdrasil, a world that will have to be shaped by the players themselves, be it economically or otherwise, absolute freedom will be granted and it will be up to the strongest to make the law.
Whether for good or ill, the future of the world of Yggdrasil will depend on the will of the players. Become an emperor, an adventurer, a mercenary or a simple merchant.
Steal money and other items from your comrades, slaughter your prey, or bring justice to the edge of your sword.
In Yggdrasil, death has an impact and consequences, and every action must be carefully considered, especially when visiting the many deadly trap dungeons...

Features:

  • Free World in 3D
  • A death with consequences
  • Possibility of destroying the world
  • Possibility to create weapons, armors, items
  • Various basic and hidden classes
  • Freedom to do evil (kill, steal... from players)
  • Very difficult and hardcore game

content_descriptors.notes: Defeated enemies may bleed if attacked.

name: World of Yggdrasil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit, Windows® 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5　2.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX750 or better AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card which supports DirectSound®

short_description: Become emperor, criminal or merchant in the world of Yggdrasil... Choose your path in the world of Yggdrasil !
